DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare relative efficacy four different treatment modality ( i.e . aggressive lubrication , bandage contact lens , Ambiodisk amniotic membrane , Prokera amniotic membrane ) heal persistent corneal epithelial defect follow retina surgery .
DOC.criteria: 3.1 Inclusion Criteria Adults age 18 older ( inclusive ) time study enrollment Recent history retina surgery Presence persistent epithelial defect 7 day later surgery English speaking 3.2 Exclusion Criteria NonEnglish speaking patient Inability incapacity provide consent study History corneal epithelial limbal stem cell disease
